resources.string: Barcode Expert is extremely easy to use; simply point to QR or barcode with this app’s camera and app will automatically detect and scan it. No need to press any buttons or anything. a. PHONE CAMERA (BACK & FRONT): Use your Front or back camera to scan a Barcode, QR-Code, Data-Matrix, etc. and instantly detect encoded data. b. FLASHLIGHT: If your device has flashlight, you can easily scan barcodes by turning on flashlight. c. CREATE BARCODES: Barcode Expert easily allow users to generate & save various types of Barcode. As for Example. (QR CODE, AZTEC, DATA MATRIX, UPC-A, PDF 417, etc.). d. SHARE SCANNED DATA: with Barcode Expert, you can easily share your scanned data through social media like WhatsApp, Facebook, etc. also SMS and email your data with others. e. AUTO ACTION: Enable Auto Action to open link automatically after scanned. Scan product barcodes with Barcode Expert in shops and compare prices with online prices to save money. Barcode Expert app is the only QR code reader / barcode scanner you will ever need. Like us on : https://www.facebook.com/CreativeLizard/
Barcode Expert – The Best Barcode Scanner for your Android Device.
